description: Source code for a thread-aware file access tracer and visualizer, utilizing ptrace to monitor system calls, process and thread creation/termination, and file operations, with HTML report generation.

classes.name: ProcessType
classes.description: Enum to distinguish between processes and threads

classes.name: ThreadInfo
classes.description: Structure to store thread or process information, including parent-child relationships and status

classes.name: FileOperation
classes.description: Structure to store details of file operations such as open and execve

methods.name: get_thread_name
methods.description: Retrieves the thread name from /proc filesystem

methods.name: handle_thread_creation
methods.description: Handles creation of a new thread or process, updating thread_map

methods.name: handle_thread_exit
methods.description: Handles cleanup when a thread or process exits, detaching ptrace

methods.name: resolve_fd_path
methods.description: Resolves the file descriptor path for a given pid and fd

methods.name: resolve_relative_path
methods.description: Resolves relative paths based on a base directory

methods.name: read_process_string
methods.description: Reads a null-terminated string from a process's memory via ptrace

methods.name: handle_syscall_entry
methods.description: Processes system call entry events, tracking clone/fork, file opens, and execve

methods.name: generate_html_output
methods.description: Generates an HTML report from collected file operations

methods.name: validate_output_file
methods.description: Validates that the output file path is writable and valid

methods.name: validate_command
methods.description: Checks if the command is valid and executable
